content: > this pattern is available for **free** on > my website click the link above **skill level intermediate** animal granny square collection chicken 1 - puppy 2 - tiger 3 - koala 4 - bunny 5 - chick 6 - ox 7 - mouse 8 - monkey 9 - turkey 10 - piggy 11 - kitty 12 - duckling 13 - frog 14 greetings fellow crochet enthusiasts my original plan was to unveil this pattern back in february but it was unfortunately delayed nevertheless i still wanted to share this delightful granny square with you all inspired by the unique features of chinese dragons from their sinuous shapes to the vibrant colors i bring you another animal face granny square making each face feature should be a simple task and a chart has been included to make the instructions clearer what follows is basically assembling the crocheted pieces by sewing them in their place if you haven t noticed i have decided to leave the sides of the scales and the upper tips of the horns detached to add dimension to the face so i hope you join me - whether you re a seasoned crochet expert or just starting your yarn-filled adventure- in weaving a piece of art that captures the spirit of the year of the dragon get your hooks ready and let s crochet **materials you will need ** * suggested yarn d m c happy cotton 0 7 oz 20 g 47 yards 43 m in the following colors and quantities one white skein one red skein one yellow skein a few yards meters of light yellow and black yarn * crochet hook size d/3 3 mm * tapestry needle 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/year-of-the-chicken-grannysquare 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/puppy-granny-square 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/year-of-the-tiger-grannysquare 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/koala-granny-square 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bunny-granny-square 6 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/easter-chick-granny-square 7 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/year-of-the-ox-granny-square 8 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mouse-granny-square 9 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/monkey-face-granny-square 10 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/turkey-granny-square-2 11 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/piggy-granny-square 12 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/kitty-granny-square-2 13 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/duckling-granny-square 14 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/frogy-granny-square
